show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Vaccine$
content:
How will ObamaCare affect MDs, patients, and the practice of medicine? Who says there’s no money in making vaccines? <!--more--> Is Tamiflu a scam?
Who should fund medical research?
The mammography industry is clinging to a failed test for women under age 50 Vicki’s 20-20 tips Natural alternatives to medications for headaches How to take and store homeopathic remedies
